alert.note: Alert for Rockland; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 28 at 12:40PM EDT until May 28 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR BERGEN...SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES... At 1240 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ridgewood, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Bergenfield and Oradell around 1250 PM EDT. Monsey around 100 PM EDT. Nanuet and Pearl River around 105 PM EDT. Tappan around 110 PM EDT. New City and Orangeburg around 115 PM EDT. Dobbs Ferry and Nyack around 125 PM EDT. Tarrytown around 130 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
